name: ProjectArcana
description:
Project Arcana

In Project Arcana you'll play as Sylvio. A young man growing up in the little village Hopenheim. Growing up with your parent you have decided to assist them and your village and join the local Townsguard. You're also interested in the experience it will grant you!

What you can expect

- Walk through the village and talk to the inhabitants. Who knows what they'll have to say around the day!
- Fulfill your duties! You're employed now after all.
- Combat foes in a turn-based system!
- Elemental weaknesses. Take your enemies gear into account!

Credits

Sounds & Music: WeLoveIndies / EpidemicSound
Everything else: Me! (With exception of some help from my fellow students, thanks for everything!)

Personal Notes

Hello! Thanks for checking in.
This game was made for my 6th and final term of my Game Creator study course.
I hope you'll find some enjoyment in it if you choose to give it a try :D
Please check out my other games and GameJam entries!
